languages.text: "Некогда сие великое вместилище полнилось гулом сервомоторов и трелями священной электрики! Но духи машин покинули это место".

traits.locale_text: "Некогда сие великое вместилище полнилось гулом сервомоторов и трелями священной электрики! Но духи машин покинули это место".

languages.text: "Once this great vessel was filled with the hum of servomotors and the trill of sacred electrics! But the machine spirits have forsaken this place."
languages.original_text: "Некогда сие великое вместилище полнилось гулом сервомоторов и трелями священной электрики! Но духи машин покинули это место".

traits.locale_text: "Once this great vessel was filled with the hum of servomotors and the trill of sacred electrics! But the machine spirits have forsaken this place."
"Once this great vessel was filled with the hum of servomotors and the trill of sacred electrics! But the machine spirits have vacated this place."
"Once this great vessel was filled with the hum of servomotors and the trill of sacred electrics! But the machine spirits have forsaken this place."
"Once this great vessel was filled with the hum of servomotors and the trill of sacred electrics! But the machine spirits have forsaken this place."
"Once this great vessel was filled with the hum of servomotors and the trill of sacred electrics! But the machine spirits have forsaken this place."

languages.text: 「この偉大な船はかつてサーボモーターの機械音や聖なる電流の振動で満たされていたのです！しかし、機械精霊に見放されてしまった」
languages.original_text: "Once this great vessel was filled with the hum of servomotors and the trill of sacred electrics! But the machine spirits have forsaken this place."

traits.locale_text: 「この偉大な船はかつてサーボモーターの機械音や聖なる電流の振動で満たされていたのです！しかし、機械精霊に見放されてしまった」

languages.text: «¡Esta nave, antaño grandiosa, estaba llena del zumbido de servomotores y el trinar de la sagrada electrónica! Pero los espíritus máquina han abandonado este lugar».
languages.original_text: "Once this great vessel was filled with the hum of servomotors and the trill of sacred electrics! But the machine spirits have forsaken this place."

traits.locale_text: «¡Esta nave, antaño grandiosa, estaba llena del zumbido de servomotores y el trinar de la sagrada electrónica! Pero los espíritus máquina han abandonado este lugar».

languages.text: “这艘巨大的舰船，伺服马达的嗡鸣声与电力系统的神圣震颤曾回荡在整艘船上！然而，机魂早已抛弃了这里。”
languages.original_text: "Once this great vessel was filled with the hum of servomotors and the trill of sacred electrics! But the machine spirits have forsaken this place."

traits.locale_text: “这艘巨大的舰船，伺服马达的嗡鸣声与电力系统的神圣震颤曾回荡在整艘船上！然而，机魂早已抛弃了这里。”

languages.text: « Jadis, ce noble vaisseau résonnait des vrombissements des servomoteurs et des trilles de l'électronique sacrée ! Mais les esprits de la machine ont déserté ce lieu. »
languages.original_text: "Once this great vessel was filled with the hum of servomotors and the trill of sacred electrics! But the machine spirits have forsaken this place."

traits.locale_text: « Jadis, ce noble vaisseau résonnait des vrombissements des servomoteurs et des trilles de l'électronique sacrée ! Mais les esprits de la machine ont déserté ce lieu. »

languages.text: "Einst war dieses große Schiff erfüllt vom Summen der Servomotoren und vom Sirren heiliger Elektrik! Doch die Maschinengeister haben es verlassen."
languages.original_text: "Once this great vessel was filled with the hum of servomotors and the trill of sacred electrics! But the machine spirits have forsaken this place."

traits.locale_text: "Einst war dieses große Schiff erfüllt vom Summen der Servomotoren und vom Sirren heiliger Elektrik! Doch die Maschinengeister haben es verlassen."

languages.text: "Bir zamanlar bu yüce gemi, hizmotorların uğultusu ve kutsal elektriğin şakımasıyla doluymuş! Ancak makine ruhları burayı terk etmiş."
languages.original_text: "Once this great vessel was filled with the hum of servomotors and the trill of sacred electrics! But the machine spirits have forsaken this place."
